text: Experienced Python developer skilled in Django, REST APIs, backend engineering and SQL.
Digital marketer experienced in SEO, Google Ads, Facebook Ads, email marketing, and analytics.
UI/UX designer with experience in Figma, wireframes, user flows, prototyping, and usability testing.
Data analyst skilled in Power BI, Excel, SQL, and data visualization with dashboards.
Machine learning engineer experienced in training ML models, Python, pandas, and scikit-learn.
